abstract: Firefighters from Florida Task Force 1 evacuated residents stranded on Sanibel and Captiva Islands after Hurricane Ian destroyed the bridge that connects them to mainland Florida.
snippet: Firefighters from Florida Task Force 1 evacuated residents stranded on Sanibel and Captiva Islands after Hurricane Ian destroyed the bridge that connects them to mainland Florida.

abstract: The N.F.L. said its concussion protocols were followed when Tua Tagovailoa hit his head on Sunday. On Thursday, the quarterback left the field on a stretcher after a second head hit.
snippet: The N.F.L. said its concussion protocols were followed when Tua Tagovailoa hit his head on Sunday. On Thursday, the quarterback left the field on a stretcher after a second head hit.
